publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1219# Dr Richard Simpson: Fife and Central Scotland Rail Link-That the Parliament notes the need for improved infrastructure connecting Fife to Central Scotland and supports the reopening of the Stirling, Alloa and Dunfermline rail link with the potential to link to the developing port of Rosyth. Supported by: Scott Barrie*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-1219# Fife and Central Scotland Rail Link (lodged on 26 September 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-1219# Dr Richard Simpson: Fife and Central Scotland Rail Link—That the Parliament notes the need for improved infrastructure connecting Fife to Central Scotland and supports the reopening of the Stirling, Alloa and Dunfermline rail link with the potential to link to the developing port of Rosyth. Supported by: Scott Barrie, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Keith Harding
S1M-1219# Fife and Central Scotland Rail Link (lodged on 26 September 2000) Bruce Crawford*, Donald Gorrie*, Maureen Macmillan*

Supported by: Scott Barrie, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Keith Harding, Bruce Crawford, Donald Gorrie, Maureen Macmillan, Mr David Davidson, Elaine Smith, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Jamie Stone, Rhoda Grant*
